name: Earch
text: Chris, I don't think we have any choice but to continue down this pit.

name: Chris
text: And when do you think we could go back up ?

name: Earch
text: The question isn't even when, but how, let's keep going and see if the opportunity presents itself...

name: Neant
text: The deeper your journey takes you, the clearer the truth shall become.

name: Neant
text: Return will soon be at hand.

name: Neant
text: But would you rather avert your eyes from a message that appears addressed to you ?
